stretches.name: Shoulder Blade Squeezes
stretches.description: Sit or stand, pinch shoulder blades together and hold briefly.
stretches.advice: Keep movement controlled, focus on squeezing.

stretches.name: Bicep Curls
stretches.description: Curl one arm up slowly, pause at the top, then lower.

stretches.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
stretches.description: On hands and knees, arch back up (Cat) and down (Cow).

stretches.name: Reverse Lunges
stretches.description: Step back into a lunge, lowering the body. Alternate legs.
stretches.advice: Keep front knee over ankle, engage core.

stretches.name: Towel Rows
stretches.description: Grab a towel, pull it towards chest, elbows close to body.
stretches.advice: Control the movement, focus on engaging upper back.

stretches.name: Seated Core Twists
stretches.description: Sit with feet flat, twist torso to one side and hold.
stretches.advice: Keep movements controlled, avoid excessive rotation.
